root: ^If only your strength matched your wit.
^You were a fool to attack the great House Ivy.
^No. I am afraid you were correct.
^We have no hand in the magic destabilizing.
^If we did, you would have died far sooner.
^If only you had believed us, you would not have to die.
^I have stabbed you two inches below your heart.
^But now, I will protect my people from the harm you caused.
^You are badly injured. LEVALON leaves. But a portal appears in front of you.
^Huh? ... A portal. I just... need to...
^Gravely wounded, You make it through the portal.
